course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Social Inequality in China, 1700-2000, in Comparative Perspective
course.description: This course summarizes some of the new directions in Chinese history and social science produced by the creation and analysis of big historical datasets based on newly opened Chinese archival holdings, and organizes this knowledge in a framework that sheds new light on social inequality in China, 1700-2000, in comparative perspective.
